app_description.message: Free, ad-free, open-source simple password generator.

message_th_time.description: Column header for time in history table

message_th_parameter.description: Column header for parameter in history table

message_th_salt.description: Column header for salt value in history table

message_th_pw.description: Column header for password in history table

message_th_action.description: Column header for actions in history table

nav_tab_settings.description: Navigation tab label for settings page

nav_tab_history.description: Navigation tab label for history page

nav_tab_export.description: Navigation tab label for export page

nav_tab_about.description: Navigation tab label for about page

settings_options_parameter_history.description: Option to enable parameter history tracking

settings_options_save_randompw_history.message: Save generated random passwords to history
settings_options_save_randompw_history.description: Option to save randomly generated passwords to history

settings_options_save_fixedpw_history.message: Save generated fixed passwords to history
settings_options_save_fixedpw_history.description: Option to save fixed generated passwords to history

settings_options_search_matched_history.message: Automatically search matching history and load parameters
settings_options_search_matched_history.description: Option to auto-search history for matching parameters

settings_options_sync_to_cloud.message: Sync settings and history to browser cloud

settings_options_remember_last_parameter.description: Option to remember the last used parameters

settings_options_remember_master_passwor.description: Option to store master password with security warning

settings_options_hide_generated_password.description: Option to hide generated passwords by default

settings_options_forgot_password_expire_.description: Option to set timeout for forgetting master password

settings_options_max_history.description: Option to set maximum number of history entries

settings_options_parameter_history_descr.message: When checked, all parameters used with the 'Generate' button will be recorded in history.
settings_options_parameter_history_descr.description: Detailed explanation of parameter history option

settings_options_save_randompw_history_d.message: When checked, all generated random passwords will be saved to history.
settings_options_save_randompw_history_d.description: Detailed explanation of random password history option

settings_options_save_fixedpw_history_de.message: When checked, all generated fixed passwords will be saved to history.
settings_options_save_fixedpw_history_de.description: Detailed explanation of fixed password history option

settings_options_search_matched_history_.message: When checked, the system will automatically search history for matching salt values and load the corresponding parameters.
settings_options_search_matched_history_.description: Detailed explanation of auto-search history option

settings_options_sync_to_cloud_descripti.message: When checked, all settings and history will be synchronized to your browser's cloud, allowing you to use the same configuration across different devices.
settings_options_sync_to_cloud_descripti.description: Detailed explanation of cloud sync option

settings_options_remember_last_parameter.message: When checked, the extension will automatically load the last used parameters when reopened.
settings_options_remember_last_parameter.description: Detailed explanation of remember parameters option

settings_options_remember_master_passwor.message: When checked, the master password will be stored in the extension, which could potentially allow others to access your passwords.
settings_options_remember_master_passwor.description: Detailed explanation of master password storage option with security warning

settings_options_hide_generated_password.message: When checked, generated passwords will be hidden by default and will require clicking a 'Show' button to view.
settings_options_hide_generated_password.description: Detailed explanation of hiding generated passwords option

settings_options_forgot_password_expire_.message: After the specified time period, the master password will be automatically forgotten. Setting to 0 will disable this feature.
settings_options_forgot_password_expire_.description: Detailed explanation of master password timeout option

settings_options_max_history_description.message: Sets the maximum number of history records to keep. Older records will be deleted when this limit is reached.
settings_options_max_history_description.description: Detailed explanation of maximum history records option

export_remark.message: Note: Exported data is not encrypted. Please keep it safe.

message_source.description: Label for source code repository link
